resources.string: Specify an IP address and Port to connect to a Milight device remotely.

To use this, you need to forward incoming UDP packets on your router to the local IP address of your Milight iBox1 or iBox2 at port 5987.\nFor now; After pressing the "Connect" button, the connection will be saved to the list *only* if a connection could be established.
Please wait. Discovering, or, attempting connection..\nMax 16 seconds for an iBox to respond.
The IP address you entered apppears to be a local IP address, and however it may work locally, will *not* work over mobile networks. You need to enter the external IP of the router.
